Description.Text: This modern hotel in Houston Texas features Italian-inspired guestrooms, gracious amenities, and impeccable service. Hotel's spacious guestrooms are outfitted in planked hardwood floors, dramatic deep chocolate corridors, full width windows and Italian designed accents. Located in the renowned CITY CENTER, Hotel Sorella CITY CENTER is surrounded by entertainment, fine dining, shopping and more for an exciting trip to the Space City. With several in-house restaurants and bars, including a light fare poolside bar, hotel's Houston luxury hotel sets the standard for upscale hotels.

Located in West Houston's prestigious City Center development, situated within a few miles of both the Energy Corridor and the Westchase District, and surrounded by sophisticated retailers and dining options.

Deluxe Double - Two Double Beds - Max 4 guests. Room overlooks the CITYCENTRE plaza or downtown Houston. Contemporary and sophisticated 410 square foot guest room with stylish furnishings, dark hardwood floors, luxurious bed and bath linens, plus floor to ceiling windows for abundant natural light. Traditional bathtub and shower combination. Room has a desk, mini bar, in room safe, and 37 inch plasma tv, complimentary wireless throughout.
Junior Suite - One King Bed - Max 3 guests. Room features views of Energy Corridor or CITYCENTRE plaza and downtown Houston. Contemporary and sophisticated 525 square foot guest room with stylish furnishings, dark hardwood floors, luxurious bed and bath linens, plus floor to ceiling windows for abundant natural light with sitting area within the room. Spacious walk in shower. Room has a desk, mini bar, in room safe, and 37 inch plasma tv, complimentary wireless throughout.
Deluxe King - One King Bed - Max 2 guests. Room features views of CITYCENTRE plaza and downtown Houston. Contemporary and sophisticated 410 square foot guest room with stylish furnishings, dark hardwood floors, luxurious bed and bath linens, plus floor to ceiling windows for abundant natural light. Spacious walk in shower. Room has a desk, mini bar, in room safe, and 37 inch plasma tv, complimentary wireless throughout.
Traditional King - Traditional King room offers 1 king bed with Premium bedding, Desk, In-room safe (accommodates laptop), In-room safe, Wireless (high-speed) Internet access - complimentary, Wired (high-speed) Internet access - complimentary, Dial-up Internet access - complimentary, 37-inch television, Television - Flat-panel, Television - Plasma, Television - Satellite service, Premium TV channel(s), Speakerphone. Telephone, Free local calls, Voice mail, Clock radio, Minibar, Coffee/tea maker, Shower only, Makeup/shaving mirror, Designer toiletries, Bathrobes, Hair dryer, Iron/ironing board, Complimentary newspaper (M-F), Blackout drapes/curtains, Air conditioning, Climate control and Non-smoking rooms only.
